column4: hello all.  I'm having some trouble seting a route.  I keep getting an error stating that the "Network is unreachable".  Any takers?
is your network card plugged in?  :]
it is.  route is for a network segment that is not on the local network segment.  I'm trying to set the gateway to use.
that is the command i used.  generated message that the network is unreachable.
that was the output of the route command?
do you have to go thru the default gw to reach  172.16.100.2 ?
so the NIC on your LAN is 172.16.100.2 ?
so your gateway is 172.16.100.3 isn't it?
default gateway?  that is set to the internet router.  172.16.100.0/24 has a gateway to the internet via 172.16.100.1.  I am trying to set a route to my remote network of 10.0.1.0/24
no the gateway for the 10.* network.   route add -net 10.foo gw 172.x.y.3   <  .3 not .2  (?)  you said you'd used .2 before
breezy-ca left...  looks ok to me
